languages.text: "Вот я и старшую. Старшую и жду, когда явится какой-нибудь матерый проповедник, что чином повыше, да выгонит меня взашей из командиров. Стыдно, когда у главы духовной миссии все лицо в шрамах, полученных на неправедных делах".

traits.locale_text: "Вот я и старшую. Старшую и жду, когда явится какой-нибудь матерый отче, что чином повыше, да выгонит меня взашей из командиров. Стыдно, когда у главы духовной миссии все лицо в шрамах, полученных на неправедных делах".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "So I'm running things now. I'm running things till some big old reverend of a higher rank than mine shows up, tells me to get lost, and takes over. It's an embarrassment for the head of a mission to have scars all over his face, making it plain for all to see that he did ungodly things in the past."
languages.original_text: "Вот я и старшую. Старшую и жду, когда явится какой-нибудь матерый проповедник, что чином повыше, да выгонит меня взашей из командиров. Стыдно, когда у главы духовной миссии все лицо в шрамах, полученных на неправедных делах".

traits.locale_text: "So I'm being in charge. I'm being in charge till some big old reverend of higher rank than mine shows up, tells me to get lost, and takes over. It's an embarrassment for the head of a mission to have scars all over his face, for all to see that he did ungodly things in the past."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "So I'm being in charge. I'm being in charge till some big old reverend of higher rank than mine shows up, tells me to get lost, and takes over. It's an embarrassment for the head of a mission to have scars all over his face, for all to see that he did ungodly things in the past."

It's an embarrassment for the head of a mission to have scars all over his face, for all to see that he did ungodly things in the past."

traits.locale_text: "So I'm being in charge. I'm being in charge till some big old reverend of higher rank than mine shows up, tells me to get lost, and takes over. It's an embarrassment for the head of a mission to have scars all over his face, for all to see that he did ungodly things in the past."

traits.locale_text: "So I'm running things now. I'm running things till some big old reverend of a higher rank than mine shows up, tells me to get lost, and takes over. It's an embarrassment for the head of a mission to have scars all over his face, making it plain for all to see that he did ungodly things in the past."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "So I'm running things now. I'm running things till some big old reverend of a higher rank than mine shows up, tells me to get lost, and takes over. It's an embarrassment for the head of a mission to have scars all over his face, making it plain for all to see that he did ungodly things in the past."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: “于是我就成为了负责人。我会一直负责这里的事情，直到某个级别比我更高的老牧师来这里，让我滚蛋，然后把所有的事情接手过去为止。身为布道所的负责人，满脸伤疤是件挺尴尬的事情，因为所有人都能一眼就看出来我以前不是什么好人。”
languages.original_text: "So I'm running things now. I'm running things till some big old reverend of a higher rank than mine shows up, tells me to get lost, and takes over. It's an embarrassment for the head of a mission to have scars all over his face, making it plain for all to see that he did ungodly things in the past."

traits.locale_text: “于是我就当了负责人。我会一直负责这里的事情，直到某个级别比我更高的老牧师来这里，让我滚蛋，然后把所有的事情接手过去。身为布道所的负责人，满脸伤疤是件挺让人尴尬的事情，因为所有人都会知道他过去做过邪恶的事情。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: 「という事で、今は私が仕切っている。少なくとも、地位の高い老いぼれ司祭が現れて、失せろと言って後を引き継ぐまでは、私が責任者です。任務の責任者が誰の目にも明らかに、過去に不道徳な行いをしたせいで顔が傷だらけだなんて、恥ずかしい事です」
languages.original_text: "So I'm running things now. I'm running things till some big old reverend of a higher rank than mine shows up, tells me to get lost, and takes over. It's an embarrassment for the head of a mission to have scars all over his face, making it plain for all to see that he did ungodly things in the past."

traits.locale_text: 「という事で、今は私が仕切っている。少なくとも、地位の高い老いぼれ司祭が現れて、失せろと言って後を引き継ぐまでは、私が責任者です。任務の責任者が誰の目にも明らかに、過去に不道徳な行いをしたせいで顔が傷だらけだなんて、恥ずかしい事です」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: «Así que ahora estoy yo al mando hasta que aparezca algún reverendo de mayor rango, me mande por ahí y tome las riendas. Es una vergüenza que el jefe de una misión tenga cicatrices por todo su rostro y que todos puedan ver que hizo cosas impías en el pasado».
languages.original_text: "So I'm running things now. I'm running things till some big old reverend of a higher rank than mine shows up, tells me to get lost, and takes over. It's an embarrassment for the head of a mission to have scars all over his face, making it plain for all to see that he did ungodly things in the past."

traits.locale_text: «Así que estoy al mando. Lo estaré hasta que aparezca algún reverendo de mayor rango, me mande por ahí y tome él el mando. Es una vergüenza que el jefe de una misión tenga cicatrices por todo su rostro y que todos puedan ver que hizo cosas impías en el pasado».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Also habe ich nun das Sagen. Ich habe das Sagen, bis irgendein alter Reverend mit einem höheren Rang auftaucht, mir sagt, ich solle verschwinden, und den Laden übernimmt. Es ist eine Schande für den Leiter einer Mission, so ein vernarbtes Gesicht zu haben — denn so sehen alle, dass er in der Vergangenheit gottlose Dinge getan hat."
languages.original_text: "So I'm running things now. I'm running things till some big old reverend of a higher rank than mine shows up, tells me to get lost, and takes over. It's an embarrassment for the head of a mission to have scars all over his face, making it plain for all to see that he did ungodly things in the past."

traits.locale_text: "Also habe ich das Sagen. Ich habe das Sagen, bis irgendein alter Reverend mit einem höheren Rang auftaucht, mir sagt, ich solle verschwinden, und den Laden übernimmt. Es ist eine Schande für den Leiter einer Mission, so ein vernarbtes Gesicht zu haben — denn so sehen alle, dass er in der Vergangenheit gottlose Dinge getan hat."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: « Donc oui, je suis aux commandes maintenant. Et je continuerai à jouer ce rôle jusqu'à ce qu'un révérend de rang supérieur vienne prendre ma place. Le chef d'une mission ne devrait pas avoir le visage couvert de cicatrices qui attestent de tous les crimes qu'il a commis par le passé. »
languages.original_text: "So I'm running things now. I'm running things till some big old reverend of a higher rank than mine shows up, tells me to get lost, and takes over. It's an embarrassment for the head of a mission to have scars all over his face, making it plain for all to see that he did ungodly things in the past."

traits.locale_text: « Donc oui, je suis aux commandes et je continuerai à jouer ce rôle jusqu'à ce qu'un révérend de rang supérieur vienne prendre ma place. Le chef d'une mission ne devrait pas avoir le visage couvert de cicatrices qui attestent de tous les crimes qu'il a commis par le passé. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "İşleri artık ben yönetiyorum. Benden daha yüksek rütbeli, ihtiyar, kodaman bir muhterem ortaya çıkıp bana kaybolmamı söyleyene ve ipleri eline alana kadar en azından. Misyon'un liderinin yüzünün, geçmişte yaptığı tanrı tanımaz şeyleri herkesin görebilmesini sağlayan yara izleriyle dolu olması utanılasıdır."
languages.original_text: "So I'm running things now. I'm running things till some big old reverend of a higher rank than mine shows up, tells me to get lost, and takes over. It's an embarrassment for the head of a mission to have scars all over his face, making it plain for all to see that he did ungodly things in the past."

traits.locale_text: "İşleri artık ben yönetiyorum. Benden daha yüksek rütbeli, ihtiyar, kodaman bir muhterem ortaya çıkıp bana kaybolmamı söyleyene ve ipleri eline alana kadar en azından. Misyon'un liderinin yüzünün, geçmişte yaptığı tanrı tanımaz şeyleri herkesin görebilmesini sağlayan yara izleriyle dolu olması bir utanç kaynağı."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04
